publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-5333 Congratulations to Neil Kinnock (lodged on 1 December 2009) Jack McConnell*

S3M-5333 Des McNulty: Congratulations to Neil Kinnock—That the Parliament welcomes the decision of Glasgow Caledonian University to award an honorary degree to Neil Kinnock, former European Commissioner and leader of the Labour Party, in recognition of Mr Kinnock’s outstanding contribution as a politician, statesman and champion of increased educational opportunities for those previously denied them. R Supported by: Jack McConnell
